Each subdirectory of this directory should contain two files
* input.uml
* expected.umltst
and may contain a directory called
* doc

Be warned: tests are allowed to change and even remove any file or directory in these subdirectories
that are not the specified files or inside the specified directory.

Be informed: when a test in a particular subdirectory fails, temporary files and directories
that help diagnosis are allowed to remain in that subdirectory.
